name: stackoverflow_bulk_search
description: Search multiple questions on Stack Overflow in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling stackoverflow_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'react hooks,python async,docker compose')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('.s-post-summary, .question-summary, [id*="question-summary"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3 a, .s-post-summary--content-title a'); const votesEl = el.querySelector('.s-post-summary--stats-item__emphasized .s-post-summary--stats-item-number, .vote-count-post strong'); const answersEl = el.querySelector('.s-post-summary--stats-item:nth-child(2) .s-post-summary--stats-item-number, .status strong'); const tagEls = el.querySelectorAll('.s-tag, .post-tag'); const tags = []; tagEls.forEach(function(t) { tags.push(t.textContent.trim()); }); results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', votes: votesEl ? votesEl.textContent.trim() : '0', answers: answersEl ? answersEl.textContent.trim() : '0', tags: tags.slice(0, 5), url: titleEl ? 'https://stackoverflow.com' + titleEl.getAttribute('href') : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
